sourcesContent:
import React from "react"
import NextLink from "next/link"
import { Box, Button } from "@chakra-ui/core"
import {
  useCreatePostMutation,
  useLogoutMutation,
  useMeQuery,
} from "../generated/graphql"
import Router from "next/router"

interface NavBarProps {}

const NavBar: React.FC<{}> = () => {
  const { data, loading } = useMeQuery()
  const [createPost] = useCreatePostMutation()
  const [logout] = useLogoutMutation()
  const router = Router

  const handleClick = async () => {
    const data = await logout()
    console.log(data)
    router.reload()
  }

  console.log(data?.me)
  return (
    <Box
      p={"absolute"}
      w={"100vw"}
      h={"80px"}
      backgroundColor={"#333"}
      display={"flex"}
    >
      {/* <InnerBar> */}
      <Box style={{ cursor: "pointer", color: "#fff" }} m="auto">
        <NextLink href="/">LOGO</NextLink>
      </Box>
      <Box display="flex" justifyContent="space-evenly" margin="auto">
        <Box style={{ color: "#fff" }} m="auto" mr="10%" w="10px">
          <NextLink href="/tags">TAGS</NextLink>
        </Box>
        <Box style={{ color: "#fff" }} m="auto" mr="10%">
          <NextLink href="/about">ABOUT</NextLink>
        </Box>
        <Box m="auto">
          <input
            placeholder="ðŸ”"
            style={{
              outline: "none",
              width: "7vw",
              textIndent: "5px",
              height: "30px",
              fontSize: "15px",
            }}
          ></input>
        </Box>
      </Box>
      {data?.me ? (
        <>
          <NextLink href="newPost">
            <Button
              p="absolute"
              right="15px"
              mt="25px"
              w="150px"
              h="50px"
              variantColor="green"
              textAlign="center"
              fontWeight="bolder"
              cursor="pointer"
            >
              Post
            </Button>
          </NextLink>
          <Button
            p="absolute"
            right="15px"
            mt="25px"
            variantColor="red"
            w="150px"
            h="50px"
            textAlign="center"
            onClick={handleClick}
            fontWeight="bolder"
            cursor="pointer"
          >
            LOGOUT
          </Button>
        </>
      ) : (
        ""
      )}
    </Box>
  )
}

export default NavBar
